Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System Diseases/Gastrointestinal Diseases/Intestinal Diseases/Colonic Diseases/Megacolon/Megacolon, Toxic
Record.Description: An acute form of MEGACOLON, severe pathological dilatation of the COLON. It is associated with clinical conditions such as ULCERATIVE COLITIS; CROHN DISEASE; AMEBIC DYSENTERY; or CLOSTRIDIUM ENTEROCOLITIS.
